This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Setup subframe 1. 
PASS Setup subframe 2. 
PASS Marker in subframe 1 disappear when disabling spell checker. 
PASS Marker in subframe 2 disappear when disabling spell checker. 
PASS Marker in subframe 1 is restored due to focus. 
PASS Marker in subframe 2 is not restored without focus. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
